entries.title_d: The Dantooine station is having major supply problems. Partly because of its remoteness, but it also looses a large number of freighters to Dantooine Raiders. The station owner has hired you to escort his freighters through the Dantooine system.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Escort the Freighters Duty
entries.thanks_5: The other guy said you would protect me.
entries.thanks_4: My cargo is yours...just keep me in one piece.
entries.thanks_3: At least you don't seem to want to blow me up.
entries.thanks_2: So you think I should be grateful?
entries.taunt_5: If I cannot have it, no one will.
entries.taunt_4: Booty! That freighter will be a rich prize.
entries.taunt_3: This is going to be easy.
entries.taunt_1: Give us that ship or we will destroy you both.
entries.shields_depleted: There went my shields. I guess you didn't want me all that badly.
entries.reason_5: Ok, we are here. The other guy said you would lead me to where you wanted me to go.
entries.reason_4: Ok, we are here. The other guy said you would lead me to where you wanted me to go.
entries.reason_3: Ok, we are here. The other guy said you would lead me to where you wanted me to go.
entries.reason_2: Ok, we are here. The other guy said you would lead me to where you wanted me to go.
entries.reason_1: Ok, we are here. The other guy said you would lead me to where you wanted me to go.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Wait for the freighter to arrive.
entries.quest_location_d: The freighters will be jumping in from the Corellian system. Meet them at their arrival location and escort them to the station.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter to the station, protecting from the Dantooine Raiders.
entries.panic_5: I think I will follow you...at least you don't seem to want to kill me.
entries.panic_4: This is rich! Pirates trying to steal from theives.
entries.panic_3: What kind of pirate are you?
entries.panic_2: Hey, you better protect your prize or your boss is going to get mad.
entries.panic_1: What a day. First I get jumped in Corellia and now this!
entries.goodbye_5: Fine, we will drop our cargo off here. You didn't have to be so pushy.
entries.goodbye_4: Fine, we will drop our cargo off here. You didn't have to be so pushy.
entries.goodbye_3: Fine, we will drop our cargo off here. You didn't have to be so pushy.
entries.goodbye_2: Fine, we will drop our cargo off here. You didn't have to be so pushy.
entries.goodbye_1: Fine, we will drop our cargo off here. You didn't have to be so pushy.
entries.found_loc: We sent you the arrival location of a freigher jumping in from another system. Meet with the freighter and escort it to the station.
entries.failed_protect: Just like everyone other freighter that comes this way. Oh well, back to the drawing board.
entries.failed_destroy: Blast it! We needed those supplies.
entries.complete: Freighter has been successfully escorted to the station. Stand by for another freighter to arrive.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Stand by for the arrival of the freighter. Make sure it gets to the station in one piece.
entries.abort: Good. I didn't want to come out here anyways.
